title: double-ICE checking `rustc_codegen_cranelift` after `cargo update`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code The reproducer is rust-lang/rust itself -- I'm at commit 51ea9bb29b07d76c5a7167d054b54f4eb7f5b44e. 1. `./x.py setup compiler` 2. `./x.py check` 3. `cargo update` 4. `./x.py check` ### Meta Stage 0 is currently: `./build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/bin/rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.61.0-beta.1 (0f231250b 2022-04-05) binary: rustc commit-hash: 0f231250ba7fe3a3f98a18aee9abfd65b104fb92 commit-date: 2022-04-05 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.61.0-beta.1 LLVM version: 14.0.0 ``` ### Error output It starts one ICE report, then panics again while printing the query stack. ``` Checking rustc_codegen_cranelift v0.1.0 (/home/jistone/rust/ice/compiler/rustc_codegen_cranelift) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no entry found for key', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder/cstore_impl.rs:547:9 ... query stack during panic: thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Illegal read of: 77323', /rustc/0f231250ba7fe3a3f98a18aee9abfd65b104fb92/compiler/rustc_query_system/src/dep_graph/graph.rs:436:25 ```
Details

``` Checking stage0 cranelift artifacts (x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -> x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu) Checking cfg-if v1.0.0 Checking hashbrown v0.11.2 Checking smallvec v1.8.0 Checking rustc-hash v1.1.0 Checking cranelift-entity v0.82.1 Checking cranelift-codegen-shared v0.82.1 Checking ar v0.8.0 (https://github.com/bjorn3/rust-ar.git?branch=do_not_remove_cg_clif_ranlib#de9ab0e5) Checking once_cell v1.10.0 Checking target-lexicon v0.12.3 Checking anyhow v1.0.56 Checking memchr v2.4.1 Checking log v0.4.14 Checking crc32fast v1.3.2 Checking cranelift-bforest v0.82.1 Checking regalloc v0.0.34 Checking indexmap v1.8.0 Checking gimli v0.26.1 Checking object v0.27.1 Checking cranelift-codegen v0.82.1 Checking cranelift-module v0.82.1 Checking cranelift-native v0.82.1 Checking cranelift-frontend v0.82.1 Checking cranelift-object v0.82.1 Checking rustc_codegen_cranelift v0.1.0 (/home/jistone/rust/ice/compiler/rustc_codegen_cranelift) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no entry found for key', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder/cstore_impl.rs:547:9 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at Note that `rustc_codegen_cranelift` has its own `Cargo.lock` which I did not update, but changes to `std` would hit everywhere. After `./x.py clean`, then `./x.py check` with the updated root `Cargo.lock` is fine.
